responsibilities: Work with the team and stakeholders to define data source, accuracy, and validation requirements.
Build, maintain, and manage data ingestions, data models, orchestrations, transformations, and validation tests.
Work with source data systems to extract and prepare data for analytics and testing.
Collaborate with technical and business teams to evolve the data architecture.
Operate within an Agile environment to consistently deliver value for clients.
skills: Expertise in data ingestion, modeling, and conformance/compliance validation.
Expert-level skills with SQL, statistical analysis, and data validation.
Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.
Proficiency in programming languages and tools such as R, Python, Scala, SPSS, Teradata, SAS, PowerBI, Tableau, and Looker.
Excellent verbal and written English communication skills.
Ability to interact with others using sound judgment and maintain a professional demeanor in a fast-paced environment.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills listed focus primarily on data management, analytics, and collaboration within an Agile environment. The responsibilities include defining data requirements, managing data ingestions, building data models, and collaborating on data architecture. The skills required emphasize expertise in data ingestion, modeling, statistical analysis, and proficiency in programming languages and tools like SQL, R, Python, and various data visualization platforms. There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is on data analytics and management rather than AI model development or deployment.
